original_title: Os Olhos na Mata e o Gosto na Água
overview: In Brazil, the inhabitants of Teewald, a German colony founded at the end of the 19th century, are still proud of their Germanic roots. Starting with the text of German-Turkish researcher Ilhami Paker, which uses irony to analyse different migratory movements, the film questions the complex process of constructing a national identity.
title: The Eyes in the Woods and the Taste in the Water
